title: What system is in place to catch people cursing in foreign garb language on NA server?
body: I read that different phrases are considered toxic on different servers.  Does the data base cross reference all servers to catch these people not speaking english on NA?

replies.body:
>different phrases are considered toxic on different servers

The reason for that isn't (only) language, but literally people from different regions considering different phrases toxic; they simply react differently to certain subjects.
So it shouldn't actually matter how offensive that phrase is on another server. They're *not* on another server.

That said, if it's obvious insults, people will obviously still find it offensive on this server and report for it.
I assume only the common foreign swears are counted. Most people dont understand them so the automated system probably doesnt hear about it often enough to consider it a problem.
